text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF. Place the baking (parchment) paper on the baking tray (sheet). Add the self-raising flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, Goji berries and lime zest to the mixing bowl. Combine. Add the chunks of cold butter and rub them into the mixture with the tips of your fingers. The mixture should appear like breadcrumbs. In the other mixing bowl, whisk the egg with the lemon juice and milk.  Pour the liquid mixture into the dry mixture and mix together with a fork.  Form a ball from the scone dough in the mixing bowl. Sprinkle flour over the work surface and a little over the dough. Spread the scone dough out on the floured surface to a decent thickness.  Cut the scone circles. Use a scone cutter or the base of a glass. Or try American style and make triangle shapes. Arrange the scones on the baking tray. Glaze each scone with a mix of the egg and water. Place in the oven. Bake for 18 minutes or until the scones have turned golden brown. Remove from the oven. Serve warm with butter as a condiment. Finished.
